qas.question: Which bridges were shut down because of filming?
Which organization provided water for weather effects?
Which river was used in some of the shoots taking place in London?
Filming closed which two bridges in London?
Who helped the filmakers simulate rain while shooting in London?
Where were the scenes of Ralph Fiennes in a restaurant shot?
Where stunt scenes on the Thames shot during the day or the night?
Whose city hall was used for filming on 8 April 2015?
Stunt scenes on an airplane were filmed near which bridge?
Scenes were shot near MI66's headquarters where?
Who was used to simulate snow?

context: A brief shoot at <b8_0>London's<b8_0/> City Hall was filmed on 18 April 2015, while Mendes was on location. On 17 May 2015 filming took place on the <a2_0>Thames<a2_0/> in London. Stunt scenes involving Craig and Seydoux on a speedboat as well as a low flying helicopter near <b9_0>Westminster<b9_0/> Bridge were shot at <a7_0>night<a7_0/>, with filming temporarily closing both <a0_0><a4_0>Westminster and Lambeth Bridges<a4_0/><a0_0/>. Scenes were also shot on the river near MI6's headquarters at <a3_0><b10_0>Vauxhall Cross<b10_0/><a3_0/>. The crew returned to the river less than a week later to film scenes solely set on Westminster Bridge. <a5_0>The <a1_0><b11_0>London Fire Brigade<b11_0/><a5_0/><a1_0/> was on set to simulate rain as well as monitor smoke used for filming. Craig, Seydoux, and Waltz, as well as Harris and Fiennes, were seen being filmed. Prior to this, scenes involving Fiennes were shot at a restaurant in <a6_0>Covent Garden.<a6_0/> Filming then took place in Trafalgar Square. In early June, the crew, as well as Craig, Seydoux, and Waltz, returned to the Thames for a final time to continue filming scenes previously shot on the river.
